description:
Our tempest tests run the following validation test for List Servers "by limits" API and fail
as the expected error codes are not returned.

test_list_servers_by_limits_pass_overlimit_value - Return an error if too large value for limit is passed

Expected Error Code - 413 BadRequest
Actual Code - 200 OK

The List Servers API for listing by limit should send the Expected error responses as above
title: Validation for List servers by Limits - expected error responses not returned
